overview: Nine episodes featuring plenty of sexually Addickted young men. They are all treated with T.L.C. - that's tender loving cocks - as they kiss, fuck and suck their way to pleasure in this vintage gay film by Robert Prion. This film has more kissing in it then any other gay film made in years. Addickted has a nice balance between lusty sex and affection; there's more kissing here than you'll see in most gay porn. All the young men are attractive and absolutely enjoy sex; because of the sexual enthusiasm Addickted is a winner.
title: Addickted
